name: Super Mario Balloon World
summary: Super Mario Balloon World is a Super Mario World rom hack themed around the Super Mario Odyssey: Balloon World mini-game. The hack takes the original levels and turns them into small puzzles. Every level has a hidden balloon, and you only have a short amount of time to find it! Luckily, coins will increase your time limit, and you're guided by a handy distance meter towards the balloon.
